      • purchaseItem

        public static void purchaseItem(boolean inPurchase)
        For purchasing stuff. Brings in data, modifies it then rewrites it into the files. Checks if overpayment, equal payment or underpayment has occurred, and addresses each separately. Methods: brings in data from text files via createCurrency and createInventory.

      • makeChange

                                            java.lang.String[][] currencyMatrix)
        For making change from overpayments Note: Has been functionally replaced Methods: brings in data from text files via createCurrency and createInventory.
